name: ifpdfor2

stmt.origin: bitr4i(wo(w0, w1), wif(w0, w0, w1), wa(wo(wn(w0), w0), wo(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, w1), wif(w0, w0, w1))
-| wb(wo(w0, w1), wa(wo(wn(w0), w0), wo(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, w1), wa(wo(wn(w0), w0), wo(w0, w1)))
-| wo(wn(w0), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, w1), wif(w0, w0, w1))
-| wb(wif(w0, w0, w1), wa(wo(wn(w0), w0), wo(w0, w1)))

|- wb(wo(w0, w1), wif(w0, w0, w1))

body.origin: |- wb(wif(w0, w0, w1), wa(wo(wn(w0), w0), wo(w0, w1)))

comment: Define or in terms of conditional logic operator. (Contributed by RP, 20-Apr-2020.)
